dialogue.s: When Francesco is away from home, he misses his mama just like you miss your tow truck amico.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: Gee, I maybe misjudged you, because that's exactly how I ---

dialogue.name: FRANCESCO
dialogue.s: Of course, I am at home.
And my mama is right here.

meta.s: Francesco refers to his MAMA who sits in a special box in the crowd, cheering him on, blowing him kisses.

dialogue.name: FRANCESCO (CONT'D)
dialogue.s: I will beat his cry-baby bottom today!

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: And there's the insult we were missing.

dialogue.name: THE LIGHTS - CLICK FROM RED TO GREEN ---

meta.s: SHOTS of the racers making the first few turns through the city streets.
We PAN to the CASINO DI PORTO CORSA.
The Beaux Arts-style architecture towers atop a hill, overlooks the course.
A group of thuggish HUGOS - ugly Eastern European cars - wait impatiently at the front.
A LIMOUSINE-STYLE car carrier rolls up to the roundabout.
An esteemed, elderly GREMLIN rolls past with a group of GREMLIN THUGS who usher him into the casino.

dialogue.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
dialogue.s: Man, those are some ugly cars.
Look like someone stole their trunks.

meta.s: The THUGS all SNICKER.
Holley arrives, sporting a decent Italian accent.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: Mio nonno, my grandfather, has broken down.
If one of you would help I would be so thankful.

meta.s: IVAN, AN EASTERN EUROPEAN TOW TRUCK (the one Holley and Finn prepped Mater to impersonate), drives forward.

dialogue.name: IVAN THE TOW TRUCK
dialogue.s: Sounds like you need some "roadside assistance".

dialogue.name: ANOTHER HUGO
dialogue.s: She was talking to me, Ivan.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: No, no, don't fight over me.

meta.s: Holley directs her interest toward Ivan.
MATER - He watches this from a safe hiding spot around a corner.
FINN, at an outdoor cafe on the casino grounds.

dialogue.name: CUT BACK TO:
dialogue.s: MATER, now looking a bit nervous.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I don't know about this, Finn.
What if I screw things up?

dialogue.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
dialogue.s: Just apply the same level of dedication you've been using to play the "idiot tow truck" and you'll be fine.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: It's just that them guys look pretty tough and --- Wait, did you say "idiot"?
Is that how you see me?

dialogue.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
dialogue.s: I tell you, that's the genius of it.
No one realizes they're being fooled because they're too busy laughing at the fool.

meta.s: While Finn talks, Mater takes this in.
He catches his own reflection in a nearby window.
Seems to be seeing himself with new eyes.
ZZZZATTT!
Mater jumps at the sound, turns in time to see Ivan SHOCKED UNCONSCIOUS by Holley's ZAPPERS.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. AROUND THE NEXT CORNER - CONTINUOUS

meta.s: Mater, now disguised as Ivan the Tow Truck, approaches the Hugos.
Another LIMO CAR CARRIER arrives.
The carrier parks and the back opens.
VICTOR HUGO waits.
Mater realizes Victor is talking to him.
He hops to it.

dialogue.name: VICTOR HUGO
dialogue.s: Ivan, why do you insult me so by making me wait?

meta.s: Mater, now with Victor hooked, tows him in the front doors of the casino.
ON FINN - now joined in the cafe by Holley who monitors everything and SEES EVERYTHING MATER SEES on her display.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. RACE COURSE - PORTO CORSA - DAY

meta.s: McQueen and Francesco battle for first place ---

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
dialogue.s: The racers are now making their way around the hairpin, and headed downhill toward the casino bridge.

meta.s: Cars play craps with FUZZY DICE; slot machines with odometers for jackpot numbers; cigarette girls sell car items.
ON MATER - He tows VICTOR.
They are flanked on all four corners by Hugo thugs, ala a presidential motorcade.
The largess of the interior design seems to finally snap Mater out of his funk.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: (WIDE-EYED) Wow, this place looks like it's made out of gold.

meta.s: The Hugos on either side of Mater exchange a look.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY (OVER RADIO)
dialogue.s: Now, be careful what you say.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: What do you mean don't talk to you?
(more talking from Holley which we cannot hear) So you want me to stop talking to you.

dialogue.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
dialogue.s: You are acting strange today, Ivan.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I have no idea what you're talking about...

meta.s: MATER'S P.O.V.
- A digital readout isolates the Hugo and starts to scroll reams of information alongside.
IN A WIDER SHOT we realize this display is invisible to all but Mater.
Some of Alex's other alias' include "Alexander Hu- Don't Go" and "Alexander the Not-So Great."

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Hey, you got a lot of aka's, Alex.
But I guess that makes sense seeings how you's wanted in France, Germany, the Czech Republic...

meta.s: Alexander Hugo, unaware of Holley's interruption, whispers to Mater as they turn a corner.

dialogue.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
dialogue.s: (to the other Hugos) Don't mess with Ivan today.

meta.s: Holley, hearing this, can't believe it.
Mater tows Victor inside a private room, where inside are the WORLD'S WORST CARS including VLADMIR TRUNKOV, TUBBS PACER and J. CURBY GREMLIN.

dialogue.name: J. CURBY GREMLIN
dialogue.s: I'm J. Curby Gremlin, from Detroit.

dialogue.name: VICTOR HUGO
dialogue.s: Is the big boss here yet?

dialogue.name: TUBBS PACER
dialogue.s: He's supposed to be here any minute.

meta.s: WHAM!
A DOOR is thrown open O.S.
Everyone turns, now silent.
ON THE DOOR - It sits open.
No one enters.
The room of Lemons watch, nervous.
ON MATER - Nervously watching too.
A car finally appears.
It's Zundapp.
Everyone looks disappointed.
MONITORS descend from the ceiling.
On them, an image of AN ENGINE - the same bloody engine from the photo.
But this is a LIVE image.
The car is being worked on.
The VOICE is garbled, scrambled.
No way to determine who.

dialogue.name: ENGINE VOICE
dialogue.s: I wish I could be with you on this very special day but... my clutch assembly broke.

meta.s: The Lemons all nod in understanding.

dialogue.name: ENGINE VOICE
dialogue.s: Today all your hard work pays off.
The world turned their backs on cars like us.
They stopped manufacturing us, stopped making our parts.
The only thing they haven't stopped doing is laughing at us.

meta.s: On VICTOR HUGO.
On TUBBS PACER.
On J. CURBY GREMLIN:
On ZUNDAPP.
And finally back on the monitor.
The ENGINE.

dialogue.name: ENGINE VOICE
dialogue.s: But their insults just give us strength.

meta.s: The monitors switch to LIVE RACE FOOTAGE.
On the VIDEO SCREENS - CARLA VELOSO'S ENGINE BLOWS ---
Veloso swerves, attempts to mitigate a crash ---

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
dialogue.s: It's Carla Veloso, the Brazilian race car.

meta.s: She skids into a wall, hard.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: (analyzing the data) I'm working on it.

meta.s: The lemons are CHEERING.
Mater is freaked out.

dialogue.name: ENGINE VOICE
dialogue.s: But now it's our turn to laugh back.

meta.s: BOOM!
Another racer blows an engine.
Mater JUMPS again.
As the racer smashes into the railing --- 89.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: I'm detecting an extremely strong electromagnetic pulse.

meta.s: Holley replays that last crash.
The OUTLINE OF THE BEAM is seen hitting the racer.
Holley TRACES THIS to its source --- --- a WGP CAMERA, which Grem and Acer have pointed at the racers from a tower position.
Finn TAKES OFF, speeding toward Grem and Acer ---

dialogue.name: ENGINE VOICE (V.O.)
dialogue.s: This was meant to be alternative fuel's greatest moment.

meta.s: Angry fans knock over cans of Allinol.
One drives over an Allinol sign.
They're fed up with it.

dialogue.name: ENGINE VOICE (V.O.)
dialogue.s: After today everyone will race back to gasoline.

meta.s: We RACK FOCUS to reveal another fan as he RIPS an Allinol banner down angrily.
The video screens are now filled with ONE IMAGE - of the OIL PLATFORMS in the Pacific from the beginning of the movie.

dialogue.name: ENGINE VOICE
dialogue.s: And we, the owners of the world's largest untapped oil reserve, will become the most powerful cars in the world!

scene.sceneheader: EXT. STREETS OF PORTO CORSA - CONTINUOUS

meta.s: Finn ducks, weaves, speeds, and pushes his way through
BYSTANDERS ---
He speeds furiously through town.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. RACE COURSE - PORTO CORSA - CONTINUOUS

meta.s: McQueen and Francesco FLY PAST US.

dialogue.name: ENGINE VOICE
dialogue.s: They will come to us and they will have no choice, `cause they will need us.

meta.s: ON FINN - He SPEEDS up a road, Grem and Acer visible ahead of him.
He LEAPS over the crevasse toward the AMC cousins --- Suddenly, FINN FREEZES.
He's immobilized in mid-air!
He looks up.
A CHOPPER with a LARGE MAGNET hovers over him.

dialogue.name: ACER
dialogue.s: (TO FINN) We figured you might stop by.

dialogue.name: ENGINE VOICE (V.O.)
dialogue.s: And they will finally respect us.
After today you will never again be ashamed of who you are!

meta.s: Grem and Acer turn back to the camera.
They line up Shu Todoroki, who's a bit further along now.
Grem ZAPS THE RACER.
Flames burst from Todoroki.
He loses control.
Shu takes down three more cars with him and others follow suit.
It's a nightmare pileup.
Holley sees Finn being flown away by the chopper.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. FINISH LINE - PORTO CORSA - CONTINUOUS

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
dialogue.s: Bumper to bumper as they approach the finish line.

meta.s: McQueen NOSES out Francesco for a win, both oblivious to what's just happened.

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
dialogue.s: And they have no idea what happened behind them.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: Hey, where are all the other cars?

meta.s: They see the pile-up from an overhead monitor.
Sirens blare as a MEDIC CHOPPER flies to the scene of the pile-up.
MILES AXLEROD - LATER.
He's near the casino.
He's completely surrounded, 360 degrees, by press.
He's drowned out by a blizzard of questions.

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER
dialogue.s: Is the final race in London still going to take place?

meta.s: PULL BACK to reveal we are watching this on monitors in the PRIVATE CASINO ROOM with the Lemonheads, Zundapp and Mater.

dialogue.name: MILES AXLEROD (ON TV)
dialogue.s: I suppose that... Look, "the show must go on" as they say.
But now is not the time to talk about...

dialogue.name: J. CURBY GREMLIN
dialogue.s: I can't believe this is really happening.

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (ON TV)
dialogue.s: Will you require all the racers to still run on Allinol?

meta.s: On Miles Axlerod: He's devastated.

dialogue.name: MILES AXLEROD (ON TV)
dialogue.s: I cannot in good conscience continue to risk the lives of any more race cars.
The final race will not be run on Allinol.

meta.s: WILD WHOOPING CHEERS fill the room.
Lemonade corks are popped.

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (ON TV)
dialogue.s: A clearly devastated Sir Miles Axlerod announcing that he will not require the cars to use Allinol for the final race.

dialogue.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
dialogue.s: To the death of Allinol and alternative fuel forever!

meta.s: Holley is already on the run.
Speeding away.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: Get out of there right now!

meta.s: She turns a corner and STOPS.
Her escape is now blocked by the same HUGO THUGS she tricked before.
Another vehicle appears BEHIND HER, LOOMS.
The Lemonheads celebrate, chant "Long live lemons!"
Mater, scared, turns to leave.
He's stopped by ALEXANDER HUGO.

dialogue.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
dialogue.s: Isn't this a great party, Ivan?

dialogue.name: ALEXANDER HUGO
dialogue.s: You are not leaving, are you?

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Uh, of course I ain't leavin'.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN (O.S.)
dialogue.s: I'm just in shock like everybody...

meta.s: He turns, sees that McQueen is being interviewed on the monitors.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN (ON TV)
dialogue.s: Crashes are part of racing, I know.
But something like that shouldn't ever happen.

dialogue.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (ON TV)
dialogue.s: They're letting you choose your fuel for the final race.
Do you have any idea what it's going to be?

meta.s: The excitement suddenly DRAINS from the room.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN (ON TV)
dialogue.s: My friend Fillmore says the fuel's safe.
I didn't stand by a friend of mine recently.
I'm not gonna make the same mistake twice.

meta.s: On Mater.
He takes this in.

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (ON TV)
dialogue.s: So a surprising revelation from Lightning McQueen...

meta.s: Zundapp is already on the phone with their Big Boss who, based on his angry O.S.
voice, sounds ticked off.
Zundapp hangs up, turns to the room.

dialogue.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
dialogue.s: Allinol must be finished for good.
McQueen cannot win the last race.

meta.s: Mater's eyes open wide.
Mater backs up, KNOCKING his emergency light against one of the monitors.
ZZZZZAT!
His holographic disguise flickers away then quickly SCROLLS THROUGH all of his previous disguises, finally revealing rusty old Mater.
The thugs DRAW TERRIFYING WEAPONS.
WHIRRRRR!
GUNS roll out of Mater on each side.
Mater SPRAYS BULLETS into the crowd.
The Lemons and Lemonheads hit the deck and RETURN FIRE --- Mater is THROWN BACKWARD by the force of the guns, back through some double doors and onto a BALCONY.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I didn't mean that kind of shoot!

meta.s: WHOOM!
A PARACHUTE BURSTS out of the back of Mater, he catches air and is YANKED INTO THE SKY!
The Lemonheads watch him float away, amazed.
ON MATER, out of the frying pan but still toasty.
He looks around, notices: LIGHTNING MCQUEEN, far away, leaving the press podium.
Mater looks down at the harbor, over which he flies.
He spots a MOTORBOAT.
Mater WHIPS his hook down, steals a ride behind the boat TOWARD MCQUEEN.
The motorboat isn't happy about this, tries to shake him.
Mater is THROWN INTO A "HOTEL" sign, then SMASHES down through a Francesco souvenir stand.
As he CRASHES onto the ground hard, we SMASH ---
--- a barricade.
Separating the press from the public, ITALIAN SECURITY TRUCKS stand guard.
MATER barrels around a corner.
He's now covered in Francesco memorabilia and palm leaves.
The word `HOT' now dangles off him like the world's biggest bling.
He looks INSANE.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: (TO SECURITY) You gotta let me in!
I gotta get through to warn McQueen!

meta.s: Security eyes one another.
This is serious.

dialogue.name: ITALIAN SECURITY #2
dialogue.s: (into a walkie-talkie) We have a lunatic at Gate Nove.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I was disguised as a tow truck to infiltrate this Lemonhead meeting and my weapons system misinterperated what I was

meta.s: SAYING ---
Mater spots McQueen far off in the distance.
JUST OFF THE PRESS STAGE - McQueen is led toward the exit.

McQueen looks up but can only see A SEA OF VEHICLES, flashbulbs, cameras, TV trucks with those tall satellite antennae things that spindle toward the sky... BACK AT THE SECURITY BARRICADE - Mater, like a nimble running back, dances around to avoid capture by security.
Mater head fakes them and pushes through, into the crowd ---
IN THE CROWD - Mater shoves his way through.
He's still far in the back.
ON MCQUEEN
ON MATER, getting CLOSER...
ON MCQUEEN - Okay, he's positive that was his friend, but where is he?
McQueen spots a TOW HOOK, moving through the crowd toward him, "Jaws"-like.
McQueen disappears into the press crowd.

dialogue.name: PRESS LIAISON
dialogue.s: No, no, where are you going?

meta.s: McQueen pushes through the press.
McQueen tracks the tow hook, gets closer.
He pushes through the last few vehicles ---

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: Mater, I'm so glad to see you.

meta.s: It's NOT MATER.
It's IVAN, the Hugo Thug's tow truck.

dialogue.name: IVAN THE TOW TRUCK
dialogue.s: I said, "You killed out there today."

meta.s: Now the Press Liaison and his assistants are pushing McQueen back in the other direction ---

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: (as he's pulled away) I really thought I heard my friend.

meta.s: As he's pulled away, press and onlookers start to come between him and Ivan, who hasn't moved.

dialogue.name: IVAN THE TOW TRUCK
dialogue.s: (TO MCQUEEN) In England you'll be finished.

meta.s: Ivan is now obscured again.
The ITALIAN PRESS being to swarm.

dialogue.name: PRESS LIAISON
dialogue.s: Please, the world press is waiting.

meta.s: McQueen is pulled back ---

scene.sceneheader: EXT. STREET - PORTO CORSA - MOMENTS LATER

meta.s: --- just as Mater, now BOUND and with HIS MOUTH TAPED, is pulled away and thrown into the back of a transport vehicle.
He lands hard on his side, spits out his TAPE.

dialogue.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
dialogue.s: You actually care about that race car.
A pity you didn't warn him in time.

meta.s: As the doors close on Mater --- PHHHHHSSSSSSTTTTTTT!
A thick, noxious gas starts to fill the truck.
On MATER as the knockout gas works its magic.
HIS EYES CLOSE.
BLACK SCREEN.

dialogue.name: MATER (V.O.)
dialogue.s: Is that how you see me?

dialogue.name: FINN (V.O.)
dialogue.s: I tell you, that's the genius of it.

meta.s: on Mater, back at the Casino, eyeing his reflection in the glass window.
It's the same moment from before except now we are watching it from a DETACHED, FLOATING PERSPECTIVE.

dialogue.name: FINN (OVER RADIO)
dialogue.s: No one realizes they're being fooled because they're too busy laughing at the fool.

meta.s: - IN THE KABUKI THEATER IN JAPAN - Again, from before.
Mater makes a spectacle of himself, WHOOPING AND HOLLERING in the stands with the face paint on.
McQueen, Fillmore, Guido, Luigi, Sarge and patrons eye Mater, embarrassed and angry.
- IN THE JAPANESE MUSEUM - The moment of Mater banging on the Zen rock garden's glass.
Except that now we see all sorts of disappointed and eyebrow raising reactions.

dialogue.name: LEWIS HAMILTON
dialogue.s: I wonder who that guy's with?

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: (HUMILIATED) Will you guys excuse me just for one little second?

meta.s: We now REVEAL that this FLOATING, THIRD PERSON PERSPECTIVE is MATER.
He's INSIDE his past, watching it from others' points of view.
He doesn't like what he sees.
- ON MATER, now at the sushi bar.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Now that's a scoop of ice cream!

meta.s: Mater swallows the wasabi with one big bite.
He SCREAMS!
The sushi bar patrons blanch with revulsion at his wail.
- ON THE FOUNTAIN, as Mater peels into full view of everyone else at the party.
As Mater laps up water from a fountain:
ALL THE RACERS, with FRANCESCO front and center, guffaw at Mater.
- On MCQUEEN, now scolding Mater moments later.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: Mater, you have to get a hold of yourself.

meta.s: - IN MCQUEEN'S PIT GARAGE, after the Japanese race.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I didn't screw you up, did I?

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: I lost the race because of you!

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Maybe if I talked to somebody, or---

meta.s: - Now BACK AT THE PARTY, a moment we didn't see before but which presumably happened.
Mater is BANGING a ceremonial GONG, to the horror of Japanese guests.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Bang a gong, get it on!

meta.s: GONNNNNNG!!!
--- On the PARTYGOERS, RACE CARS, PARTY STAFF - they're all laughing at Mater as McQueen's final words blend in, making a
DISSATISFIED CACOPHONY

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: This is exactly why I don't bring you along to these things!

meta.s: Off the GONG at the party ---
--- to the GONG of a CLOCK.
CLOSE ON MATER as he OPENS HIS EYES.
All around him, all he sees are GIANT PIECES OF MECHANIZED CLOCKWORK.
HOLLEY and FINN are here too, strapped bumper to bumper in the divots of large clock movements.
The BIG HAND finishes ADVANCING one minute.
It's 3 PM.
Suddenly Mater DROPS QUICKLY down toward --- --- whirring, scary machinery.
WHAP!
The chain yanks to a STOP.
Mater, instead of being 30 feet from death, is now 20.
Finn and Holley are only a few clicks closer to being crushed themselves.
The clock ticks to 3:01.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: This... this is all my fault.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: Mater, I was complimenting you on what a good spy you are.

meta.s: This echoes throughout the clock.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I've been trying to tell you that the whole time.
I really am just a tow truck.

meta.s: Finn and Holley take this in.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: And what's happened to McQueen is `cause I'm such a big one.

meta.s: GREM and ACER arrive on a lift, roll into view on a catwalk.

dialogue.name: GREM
dialogue.s: Professor Z wanted you to have a front row seat for the death of Lightning McQueen.

meta.s: Acer whips a sheet away, revealing the WGP CAMERA, turns it toward the clock face.
He pushes the camera through an open small window, turns it toward the course.
Mater DROPS down again --- FINN and HOLLEY CLICK FORWARD.
Big Bentley's big hand CLICKS ahead another minute.
But we're a bit farther away from it than before.

dialogue.name: SALLY (O.S.)
dialogue.s: We came as soon as you called.

meta.s: Sally, flanked by Red, Flo and Ramone, are in front of ---- --- McQueen and the rest of the team.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: I called to talk to Mater.
It never occurred to me that he wouldn't be there.

dialogue.name: RAMONE
dialogue.s: Sheriff is talking to Scotland Yard right now.

dialogue.name: FLO
dialogue.s: And Sarge is in touch with his friends in the British military.

dialogue.name: SALLY
dialogue.s: You just need to focus on the race.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: I know, but Sal, with everything going on I'm not sure I should---

meta.s: A HORN O.S.
Someone's entering the pit.
Everyone parts, revealing MILES AXLEROD.

dialogue.name: MILES AXLEROD
dialogue.s: I just wanted to come down here and personally thank you.
Because after Italy, I was finished.
And then you gave me one last shot.

dialogue.name: MILES AXLEROD
dialogue.s: And I probably shouldn't be saying this at all but...
Show the world that they've been wrong about Allinol.

meta.s: McQueen takes this in.
He looks at Sally.

dialogue.name: SALLY
dialogue.s: Mater would want you to race.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. THE STARTING GRID - MOMENTS LATER

dialogue.name: TIRES SQUEAL ---
dialogue.s: MCQUEEN, FRANCESCO and the other racers PEEL OUT ---

meta.s: We PAN UP to reveal the LEMONHEADS watching from a VIP box.
McQueen leads Francesco as they approach Big Bentley...
Grem turns up the juice to the HIGHEST, DEATH-INDUCING LEVEL.
Holley and Finn watch, helpless.
Mater closes his eyes.
Grem ZAPS MCQUEEN.
McQueen SPEEDS PAST Big Bentley, unharmed.
Oblivious to what was supposed to have just happened.
Zundapp suddenly SQUAWKS over the radio.
They're all talking at once and for a moment we cannot understand what is being said.
Grem hangs up.

dialogue.name: GREM
dialogue.s: We go to the backup plan.

dialogue.name: GREM
dialogue.s: We snuck a bomb in McQueen's pit!

dialogue.name: ACER
dialogue.s: The next time he makes a stop, instead of saying "ka-chow," he's gonna go "ka-boom"!

meta.s: They LAUGH.
Mater shudders, upset.
Grem and Acer laugh.
As they board the elevator:
Suddenly, Mater's GATLING GUNS rotate out again - a surprise to Mater.
But they SPIN IN PLACE, empty.
Grem and Acer just laugh more.

dialogue.name: GREM
dialogue.s: What, you didn't think we'd take your bullets?

meta.s: Mater NOTICES SOMETHING.
CLOSE ON WHAT MATER SEES: A small piece of his ropes have been shaved away by the Gatling.
He carefully rotates his guns BACK IN, pretending like he's seen nothing.

dialogue.name: GREM
dialogue.s: (as the elevator descends) Who's the lemon now, huh?

meta.s: They're GONE.
MATER'S COMPUTER

dialogue.name: REQUEST ACK-
dialogue.s: The guns ROTATE OUT AGAIN, SPIN.
Mater watches as the spinning barrels SLICE INTO the ropes, do some damage.

meta.s: The COMPUTER responds with each "dadgum."
The barrels continue to SPIN, CUTTING THROUGH the ropes.
MATER

dialogue.name: DADGUMDADGUMDADGUMDADGUM ---
dialogue.s: The ropes BREAK AWAY and Mater FALLS --- right toward the whirring machinery!

meta.s: Mater QUICKLY WHIPS his tow cable around, hooks a pipe and tosses himself to the ramp with a heavy THUD.
He doesn't
HESITATE:

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I gotta get you all out of there!

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: But I can't, I'm just a tow truck.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: Go to the pits and get everyone out.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: Go and get some more dents, Mater.

meta.s: Mater SPEEDS out the front door, a bat out of hell ---
On Finn and Holley, now closer to death.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: He wouldn't have left if I'd told him the truth.
(re: his death trap) Being killed by a clock.
Gives a whole new meaning to "your time has come."

meta.s: At this mention Holley seems to perk up, gets an idea.
She spies a GEARBOX below them, at least 20 feet down.
Holley

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: If I can just reverse the polarity...

meta.s: She FIRES them again.
Direct hit!
Holley JUICES the gearbox with HIGH VOLTAGE.
The CLOCK STOPS.
It reverses itself.
Finn and Holley's wheel now rotates AWAY from danger.
BIG BENTLEY, visible from street level, now moves BACKWARDS.
Fast.
CRANE DOWN TO --- --- Mater, speeding toward the track, unaware.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: What's everybody on the wrong side of the road for?

meta.s: Finn and Holley are now moving in the opposite direction, toward ANOTHER GEAR!
And it's going MUCH FASTER.
They're seconds from a crushing death...
They both DRIVE, fast as they can with FULL FORCE ---
They drive HARDER, separating bumpers with just enough room for the descending gear to SNAP THEIR ROPES!
Their tires spinning, they both LAUNCH off in opposite directions, LAND HARD on opposing platforms.
As Finn squeals around to Holley's side of the clock:

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: We've got to get to the course.

meta.s: Holley pops WINGS out of her side.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: You kids get all the good hardware.

meta.s: They turn to leave when they STOP, see SOMETHING.
It's an AIR FILTER on the ground.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: I knew his escape was too easy.

meta.s: Finn BURSTS out the front doors of Big Bentley, speeds off as HOLLEY SMASHES through the clock face, careens into view flying over the traffic ---

scene.sceneheader: INT. PIT ROW - TRACK SIDE - DAY

meta.s: Mater bursts through the security gate with aplomb, tears through the pits and stops at MCQUEEN'S.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Y'all gotta get out the pits!

meta.s: The ENTIRE RADIATOR SPRINGS GANG is here.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Hey, what are you guys doing here?

dialogue.name: SALLY
dialogue.s: We're here because of you, Mater.

meta.s: ON HIS REARVIEW DISPLAY: We can see that a BOMB has been detected, anchored to Mater's air filter.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: They knew you'd try to help McQueen.
When we were knocked out they planted it in your air filter.

meta.s: Mater SNORTS, blowing his air filter cover off.
Cross-eyed, Mater sees the explosive device attached to him.
He looks up: An ALLINOL CONTAINER hangs ominously over his head.
Mater turns.
McQueen enters Pit Row, 100 yards away and closing in FAST.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: Oh man, I've been so worried about you!

meta.s: The view of this scene through the window of a luxury box.
Reveal Zundapp in the window's reflection.
He's watching from inside.
He's poised to push a DETONATOR BUTTON.
As Zundapp's front tire approaches the detonator --- 112.
Mater PEELS OUT BACKWARDS, out onto the track.
PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP - He hesitates, can't believe it.
TV FOOTAGE OF MCQUEEN CHASING MATER

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
dialogue.s: A tow truck has just raced onto the track.

meta.s: IN MCQUEEN'S PIT
He breezes right through his pit, goes after Mater.

dialogue.name: DAVID HOBBSCAP (V.O.)
dialogue.s: Normally an emergency vehicle on the track means there's been an accident.

meta.s: Mater drives up the track.
McQueen gains, fast.
Because Mater's going backwards, they're face-to-face (but still with some distance between them).

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: If you get close to me, you gonna get hurt real bad!

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: I know I made you feel that way before, but none of that matters because we're best friends!

meta.s: TV FOOTAGE OF MCQUEEN CHASING MATER

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
dialogue.s: And McQueen seems to be having a conversation with the tow truck!

dialogue.name: DARRELL CARTRIP (V.O.)
dialogue.s: I don't know who that truck is, Brent.
But I'll tell you what, he's gotta be the world's best backwards driver.

meta.s: REVEAL ZUNDAPP is watching this footage from his luxury box.
The closer McQueen gets to Mater the farther his tire ROLLS onto the detonator.
But he holds back ever so slightly so as not to jump the gun.
ON THE TRACK - McQueen gains on Mater.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: That's what I'm trying to say here.
And you'll always be the bomb.

meta.s: ON ZUNDAPP.
He watches as McQueen SPEEDS UP.
ON MCQUEEN.
He's had enough screwing around.
Here he comes.
He's going to catch him now.
McQueen JUMPS FORWARD, in an attempt to grab Mater's HOOK ---

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: (TO HIMSELF) Gotta keep away from McQueen.

meta.s: McQueen hooks Mater with his bumper JUST AS ---
TURBINE ROCKETS slide out of Mater.
BAWHOOOOOOM!!!!!
Mater JOLTS forward with a rocket blast and disappears, taking McQueen with him.
ON ZUNDAPP.
He now freely PUSHES the detonator, but it says "OUT OF RANGE."
Zundapp can't believe it.
He FLIPS OUT.
FARTHER UP THE TRACK - Francesco speeds along.
ZHWAAAAAP!!!
Mater and McQueen ZING PAST HIM with a RED BLUR.
NOW EVEN FARTHER UP THE TRACK - Mater takes a turn, SMASHES THROUGH A FENCE and skids around a corner out of sight.
A white, smoky JET TRAIL is all that remains.
IN MCQUEEN'S PIT - All of Radiator Springs watches the television monitors, dumbfounded.

dialogue.name: BRENT MUSTANGBURGER (V.O.)
dialogue.s: And Lightning McQueen just blasted away, hooked to the now rocket- propelled tow truck.

meta.s: Overhead P.O.V.
: Mater and McQueen swerve through the streets.
Zundapp is still furiously hitting the button as Holley drops into view just beyond the glass.
Freaked, Zundapp does a 180 and SMASHES out a plate glass window, lands on a ridiculously large balloon tethered to the ground, and speeds off ---
The LEMONHEADS watch, baffled, as Zundapp drives away.
Grem and Acer are already out the door ---
Finn speeds into view, in time to see Zundapp turn a corner out of sight.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: I'll get Zundapp, you help Mater.

meta.s: Holley, still in the air, turns ---
FARTHER UP THE TRACK - Holley THUNDERS past Francesco and out of sight.
Finn screams around a corner, sees --- --- Professor Zundapp, speeding toward docks along the Thames where a COMBAT SHIP waits.
ON ZUNDAPP - With Finn gaining fast, he accelerates.
Suddenly --- WHAP!
He's been TETHERED by Finn with tensile cables now attached to his rear end.
Zundapp SCREAMS like a little girl.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: Do you really think I'm going to let you float away, Professor?

meta.s: Finn reels him in.
Zundapp spins his wheels, caught.
Suddenly Zundapp miraculously, inconceivably, GAINS TRACTION!
Now it's FINN'S WHEELS that are spinning.
ON THE COMBAT SHIP - the ELECTROMAGNET has been turned outward and switched on.
He's PULLING ZUNDAPP AND FINN IN with the magnetic force.
He pulls out a laser, TARGETS it at Finn's windshield.
Mater, still towing McQueen, rockets around a corner, zips down another street ---
They pass a Gremlin with a headset.
ON GREM AND ACER - Down another side street.
They get this message, take off in the opposite direction.
CUT BACK TO:

scene.sceneheader: EXT. DOCKS NEAR THE THAMES - CONTINUOUS

meta.s: FINN, tires squealing, loses more and more ground to the boat.
Zundapp, the "rope" in this tug-of-war, buckles under the tension.
Finn releases a mess of bullets, grenades, and other weaponry into the air --- 117.
THE MAGNET SUCKS it in quickly like a black hole --- THUNK!
It all sticks to the magnet, right next to Finn's bullets.
They're BOMBS, GRENADES, ROCKETS and one little detonator with a flashing, beeping light.
Off the boat's RXN ---

dialogue.name: ANOTHER PART OF LONDON, AT STREET LEVEL
dialogue.s: A distant explosion (miles away) festoons into the air, visible over the rooftops.

meta.s: Mater and McQueen, speeding up the street.
Then she looks over, catches a glimpse of GREM AND ACER, bearing down on them from a side street.
They're going to broadside Mater and McQueen.
ON MATER AND MCQUEEN - They're not aware of the impending impact.
Holley DROPS FROM THE SKY, hits the pavement, SKIDS into the path of the AMCs and DEFLECTS THEM.
They FLIP OVER Holley, Finn and McQueen and sail --- --- INTO A PUB --- --- where they skid across the room and SLAM into the bar, knocking a ROW OF BEER MUGS to the ground.

dialogue.name: IN THE PUB - MOMENTS LATER
dialogue.s: Grem and Acer are pulverized by the bar patrons.

meta.s: Holley, McQueen and Mater are now stopped.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: Mater, we've got to get that bomb off you.

meta.s: She's already SCANNING the bomb, working away.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Yeah, they strapped it to me to kill you as a back-up plan.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: Mater, who put a bomb on you?

meta.s: Professor Zundapp suddenly ROLLS to a stop next to (a now totally freaked) McQueen, entangled in grappling hooks care

dialogue.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
dialogue.s: Why didn't my death ray kill you?

dialogue.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
dialogue.s: Everything is voice- activated these days.

meta.s: The BOMB suddenly TRANSFORMS into a TIME BOMB, now complete with a countdown mechanism from 4:59... 4:58... Mater GASPS.

dialogue.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
dialogue.s: Did I forget to mention that it can only be disarmed by the one who activated it?

meta.s: Holley immediately shoves a GUN in Zundapp's grill.
THE BOMB'S TIMER: It loses a full minute!
Goes from 4:48 to 3:48 to 3:47... Mater GASPS.

dialogue.name: PROFESSOR ZUNDAPP
dialogue.s: (GRINNING) I am not the one who activated it.
Would anyone else like to try?

meta.s: ZZZZZZATTT!
Holley shocks him unconscious.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: He was getting on my nerves.

meta.s: VICTOR HUGO blocks the entrance to a side street.
He's surrounded by Hugo relatives.
The four streets surrounding them are now blocked by each of the Lemonheads and their families.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: (TO MATER) I'm gonna go out on a limb here.
These are the guys that want me dead, correct?

dialogue.name: MATER (CONT'D)
dialogue.s: I know what you're going through.
Everybody's been laughing at me my whole life too ---

meta.s: McQueen turns to Mater - he wasn't expecting that.
The Lemons all eye each other, considering Mater's words.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: --- but becoming powerful and rich beyond your wildest dreams ain't gonna make you feel better.

dialogue.name: J. CURBY GREMLIN
dialogue.s: Yeah, but it's worth a shot.

meta.s: WHOOM!!!
He's BROADSIDED by a blast of water from O.S.
It's Red!
He's sitting outside an underground entrance, followed by Sally and the rest of the Radiator Springs gang.
ALL OUT WAR ensues between the LEMONS, RADIATOR SPRINGS along with FINN and HOLLEY.
FINN attaches his four-way cable hooks to the thugs and springs high in the air, crushing the four of them together.
HOLLEY SPROUTS her wings, and knocks out two cars on her side.

dialogue.name: VARIOUS SHOTS OF RADIATOR SPRINGS KICKING BUTT:
dialogue.s: Guido pulls some LEMON tires off with his air gun.
In seconds he has a stack of lugnuts next to him.

meta.s: The two Pacers' tires all FALL OFF.
Flo hits VLADIMIR TRUNKOV with her high-beams, BLINDING HIM.
Sheriff BOOTS him.
Guido pushes away his tireless thug, YELLING AT HIM IN ITALIAN.
Mater KARATE CHOPS lemons, three and four at a time.
Ramone SPRAY PAINTS a lemon's windshield.
A few Lemons turn back the way they came.
BLOCKING THEIR PATH are a line of BRITISH MILITARY VEHICLES clad in digital camo, led by SARGE.

dialogue.name: BRITISH CORPORAL
dialogue.s: Anything for one of pop's mates.

meta.s: And in the middle of all of this craziness we --- --- MATER.
WRENCH BITS are strewn all around him as Guido tries wrench after wrench to take the bolts off.
No dice.
Guido gestures wildly, spits Italian a mile a minute.

dialogue.name: LUIGI
dialogue.s: None of his wrenches fit the bolts!

meta.s: This is a light bulb moment for Mater.
He eyes the bolts.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I know what needs to be done.

meta.s: Mater looks at McQueen.
It is?

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: And if people aren't taking you seriously, then they need to change.
I know that, because I was wrong before.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: No no no, you're the actual bomb.

meta.s: Mater HOOKS McQueen and they're off.
They SHOOT PAST FINN, who's in the middle of battling lemons.
ON MATER AND MCQUEEN - Flying down a side street.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I need that thing you done before to get me away from McQueen!

meta.s: The ROCKET THRUSTERS kick in.
They head right for a WALL.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Now I need you to do the chute, the second kind not the first!

meta.s: Mater's chute POPS OPEN, catching air and sending Mater and McQueen SAILING INTO THE AIR.
Mater starts to steer them the direction he wants.
He and McQueen are FLYING OVER LONDON.
The QUEEN, her attendants, assorted dignitaries are here.
Mater and McQueen drop from the sky.
They land and skid to a halt just before the Queen's guards who DRAW THEIR WEAPONS.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Somebody's been sabotaging the racers and hurting the cars and I know who.

meta.s: Mater BOWS to the Queen.
In doing so, the TICKING TIME BOMB angles into view.
The clock's at T-minus 1:53.
Finn dives onto the platform and rolls between the Queen and Mater.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: Mater, I don't know what you're doing but stand down now!

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: (aside, to McQueen) This ain't nothing at all like Radiator Springs.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: Mater, just cut to the chase!

meta.s: He turns to Miles Axlerod.
Everyone exchanges confused looks, including Finn and Holley.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: I figured it out when I realized you all attached this ticking time bomb with Whitworth bolts.
The same bolts that hold together that old British engine from the photograph.

meta.s: Holley projects the much discussed PHOTO OF THE ENGINE.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: And then I remembered what they say about old British engines - "If there ain't no oil under `em, there ain't no oil in `em."

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: It was you leaking oil at the party in Japan.
You just blamed it on me.

dialogue.name: MILES AXLEROD
dialogue.s: Electric cars don't use oil, you twit.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: You didn't convert to no electric.
We pop that hood we gonna see that engine from that picture right there.

meta.s: Mater moves toward Miles Axlerod to pop his hood.

dialogue.name: MILES AXLEROD
dialogue.s: He's going to kill us all!

meta.s: Miles Axlerod BACKS UP to the edge of the stage.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: But Sir Axlerod created the race, Mater.
Why would he want to hurt anyone?

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: To make Allinol look bad so everybody'd go back to using oil.
I mean, he said it himself with that disguised voice.

meta.s: The QUEEN'S GUARDS have had ENOUGH.
As has the PRINCE.

dialogue.name: QUEEN
dialogue.s: I'd like to see where this is going.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Yeah, but what if he found that huge oil field just as the world was trying to find something else?

meta.s: Mater sticks his ticking bomb-nose into Miles Axlerod's grill.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: What if he came up with Allinol just to make alternative fuel look bad?

dialogue.name: MILES AXLEROD
dialogue.s: You're basing this on a "What if"?

meta.s: And the QUEEN'S GUARDS spirit the Queen and Prince Wheeliam out of there FAST --- 126.
Now it's just Miles Axlerod, Mater, McQueen, Finn and Holley.
Miles Axlerod's back tires slip on the edge of the podium as he is cornered by Mater.
Everyone FLINCHES, DUCKS or DIVES FOR COVER except McQueen, Mater and Axlerod ---
The bomb FREEZES at 00:01.

dialogue.name: THE BOMB'S COMPUTER VOICE
dialogue.s: Have a nice day, Sir Axlerod.

meta.s: General shock all around.
Miles Axlerod realizes what he's done, looks terrified.
Police surround him.
Mater FLINGS Miles Axlerod's hood open with his hook, revealing AN INTERNAL COMBUSTION ENGINE, oil dripping from all sides.
It MATCHES the photo.

dialogue.name: MILES AXLEROD
dialogue.s: How did the tow truck figure it out?

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: You're coming to all my races from now on.

meta.s: Tire bump.
A massive crowd packs the adjacent streets and parks.
Mater does the requisite "silly faces" in an attempt to break the composure of a Buckingham Palace Guard.
It isn't working.
McQueen approaches.

scene.sceneheader: INT. QUEEN'S CHAMBER - BUCKINGHAM PALACE - DAY

meta.s: The Queen sits in attention at the front of the Main Ballroom.
As Mater and McQueen approach:

dialogue.name: LORD STEWARD
dialogue.s: May I present for the investiture of honorary Knighthood of the British Realm.

meta.s: McQueen joins his friends from Radiator Springs.
Mater rolls forward.
He bows, as if he's practiced it all day.

dialogue.name: QUEEN
dialogue.s: I hereby dub thee "Sir Tow Mater."

meta.s: Applause from all around.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Shoot, you can just call me Mater, Your Majesty.
I don't wanna hear none of this "Sir" business.
By the way, have y'all met each other?

meta.s: He continues introducing everyone as we ---
The town sign now reads "WELCOME TO RADIATOR SPRINGS - HOME
OF LIGHTNING MCQUEEN AND SIR TOW MATER."
Cars surround Mater and McQueen.
The rest of the Radiator Springs gang is here too, watches.
VAN and MINNY are front and center.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: So there I was: rocket jets going full blast, McQueen hanging on for dear life when suddenly them two nasty lemons come out of nowhere, guns drawed.
But then out of nowhere, this beautiful spy car swoops in from the sky to save us!

dialogue.name: MINNY
dialogue.s: That's a very entertaining story, young man.

dialogue.name: VAN
dialogue.s: Come on, none of this happened.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: It does sound a bit far-fetched.

meta.s: The crowd turns, sees HOLLEY, wings out, swooping in.
FINN is right below her, driving up the street.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: It's so nice to see you again.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: Our satellites picked up an urgent communique.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Y'all is gonna have a great time.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: It's so nice to meet you all.

meta.s: Everyone is shocked.
Including Mater.
Guido's jaw drops.

dialogue.name: FLO
dialogue.s: You got a nasty dent there.

meta.s: Indeed, Holley still wears the dent from when she saved Mater from Grem and Acer.

dialogue.name: VAN
dialogue.s: (already crushing on her) Was that from when you swooped in and saved them in London?

dialogue.name: FLO
dialogue.s: (TO HOLLEY) Don't you worry, sweet pea.
My baby Ramone can get that fixed up for you in no time.

dialogue.name: RAMONE
dialogue.s: Just let me go get my tools.

meta.s: Mater takes this in.

dialogue.name: LIZZIE
dialogue.s: Oh, she's as crazy as Mater.

dialogue.name: MACK
dialogue.s: Those two are perfect for each other.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: You know, there's one thing I still don't get.
The bad guys hit me with the beam from the camera, right?
So why didn't I, you know...

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: We couldn't figure that one out either.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: Our investigation proved that Allinol was actually gasoline.
And Miles Axlerod engineered it so that when it got hit by the beam it would explode.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: Fillmore, you said my fuel was safe.

meta.s: McQueen turns to Fillmore.
Everyone does.

dialogue.name: FILLMORE
dialogue.s: If you're implying that I switched out that rotgut excuse for alternative fuel with my all- natural, sustainable, organic biofuel just because I never trusted Axlerod, you're dead wrong, man.

dialogue.name: SARGE
dialogue.s: Once Big Oil, always Big Oil.

meta.s: A banner says "Radiator Springs Grand Prix."
SHERIFF rolls up the street.

dialogue.name: SHERIFF
dialogue.s: The Radiator Springs Grand Prix is about to begin!
All spectators clear the starting line!

meta.s: MCQUEEN heads up Main Street, other racers following.

dialogue.name: LEWIS HAMILTON
dialogue.s: Man, I can't wait to get rockin'.

dialogue.name: JEFF GORVETTE
dialogue.s: Yeah, we should do this every year.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: I just figured, we never found out who the world's fastest car is.
Just racing - the way I like it.

dialogue.name: FRANCESCO
dialogue.s: Francesco likes it like this too.

meta.s: McQueen SEES Sally.
He and Francesco approach her.

dialogue.name: FRANCESCO
dialogue.s: It is official: Lightning McQueen is the luckiest car in the world.

dialogue.name: FRANCESCO
dialogue.s: Which he will have to be to have a chance against Francesco today.

meta.s: Francesco turns to leave.
As he's moving away: 132.

dialogue.name: FRANCESCO
dialogue.s: See you at the finish line, Mc---

meta.s: Francesco STOPS.
McQueen has a new bumper sticker: "Ka-ciao, Francesco."

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: It's just something I had made up for the occasion.

dialogue.name: FRANCESCO
dialogue.s: It was funnier when I did it, but it's very funny.
What are you going to do next?
Are you going to take off your fenders?

meta.s: Francesco leaves.
We stay with McQueen and Sally.

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: That's why I love you, Sally.

meta.s: He drives off.
Flo approaches Sally.

dialogue.name: FLO
dialogue.s: I'm gonna have to go get myself some coolant.

meta.s: The racers at the starting grid.
ON THE TRAFFIC LIGHT in the center of town.
It goes from RED to GREEN!
The RACERS SPEED OFF, tearing up main street and out of town, blazing past tourists ---
As the racers, led by McQueen and Francesco, take the wide, sweeping turn around Willy's Butte we CRANE UP to see MATER, FINN, HOLLEY, and the Radiator Springs gang watching.
Everyone CHEERS.
Holley gets an alert.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: Siddeley's gassed, geared and ready to fly.

meta.s: Finn starts to back up.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: Just stopped by here to "pick something up."

meta.s: They both eye Mater, expectantly.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Something tells me you're not talking about souvenir bumper stickers.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: Her Majesty asked for you personally, Mater.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: But I told you all before.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: Spy or not, you're still the smartest, most honest chap we've ever met.

meta.s: Mater looks over at Holley.
He looks touched.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: But as much fun as it was hanging with y'all, this...

meta.s: He looks over to his friends who watch the race, CHEER MCQUEEN ON.

dialogue.name: HOLLEY
dialogue.s: You still owe me that first date.

dialogue.name: FINN
dialogue.s: If there's ever anything I can do for you, just let me know.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Well, I sure appreciate that, thank you.

meta.s: MATER, blazing forward fast.
He ROCKETS FORWARD, through the whole town.
In doing so he GRABS A BROKEN DOWN OTIS, hooking him ---
--- and TOSSING him right into Ramone's.
ON THE "RACE TRACK" - Mater flies past ALL the racers, including Francesco ---
--- until he approaches MCQUEEN.

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: They let me keep the rockets!

dialogue.name: MCQUEEN
dialogue.s: I'll see you at the finish line, buddy!

dialogue.name: MATER
dialogue.s: Not if I see you first!

meta.s: McQueen and Mater peel away from the rest of the racers, lead them off the road and into the dirt for another lap.
The two friends are side by side when we
THE END
